name: CLKComplicationTemplateCircularSmallStackText
desc: A template for displaying two text strings stacked on top of each other.

items.name: init(line1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, line2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has two lines of text.

items.name: var line1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display on the top line of the complication.

items.name: var line2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display on the bottom line of the complication.
